channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:
Potholes on the Cambridge Avenue can somebody please come and fill them in

item.title: Trip hazard, 30th April
item.description:
The tarmac around this BT access lid (next to lamp-post no3) has worn away and someone has tripped over it, pjease could this be dealt with.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Beaumont Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes at foot of Charlton abbots hill, 30th April
item.description:
Lots of potholes spread over 100metres or so at the foot of Charlton abbots hill just before the junction with Charlton abbots village to the right. Potholes are damaging vehicle wheels and suspension and are dangerous for cyclist. This whole section has been reported for at least a couple of years but little is ever done to repair the surface
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrowning hedge and tree need attention, 30th April
item.description:
In the green space next to 11 Carlyle Grove.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Carlyle Grove, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 29th April
item.description:
I reported this road 2 weeks ago and received an email that the issue has been fixed. It hasn't, there are multiple potholes on the road going up the hill. Motorists regularly drive in the centre of the road to avoid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Andoversford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipped Cardboard and Paint Tools at Westdown Carpark, 28th April
item.description:
The location is Westdown Carpark which should be shown as part of Tewkesbury District. The above material has been flytipped in the carpark. Please can it be removed as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Sevenhampton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faded white lines and arrows, 28th April
item.description:
On the approach to this roundabout from Barnwood, the lane markings are faded. You often get confused, and incompetent drivers using the middle lane (marked straight on) to then turn right, cutting up those who are in the right turn only lane. Refreshed markings, and maybe an information board on approach to clarify the lanes would be useful to avoid collisions on this roundabout.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 28th April
item.description:
Large items dumped next to clothes bank.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Cotswold Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I have emailed the Borough Council and Higways, 27th April
item.description:
The old smiths estate in bishopscleeve grass verges are in a horrendous state and lack of care , the old village has never looked so run down, I will try and attach photos, all the councils borough and highways@gloucestershire.gov.uk and Ubico are all in denial of who is responsible, mean while the council tax goes up its disgraceful, look at the original deeds and plans , Highways are responsible for most areas and tbc .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 42 Linworth Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Non Tewkesbury refuse bin, 26th April
item.description:
This bin and rubbish has been here for months and the rubbish keeps flying out

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Westover Court, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wickes flatbed trolley abandoned, 25th April
item.description:
A Wickes flatbed trolley has been abandoned at the location indicated. It has been there since Friday 22 April. The Wickes store on Tewkesbury Rd was informed on Friday and Wickes customer services were informed on Saturday. Both promised action but the trolley has not been collected.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 217 Mandarin Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of rubbish just dumped on path, 25th April
item.description:
Absolute hazard and an awful mess, this is not a unique problem or the first time. More should be done to tackle this ongoing problem.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Cotswold Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Sevenhampton
